__e: A man changed his life, and I'm just somebody who helped him do it.
At any rate, you've seen the future- the world I come from, that I helped make.
Just because I was of some slight help in getting you out of that blazing inferno... perhaps you are, momentarily, infatuated with me. But it isn't love. And I'm not in love with you.
I helped you as you didn't know where to turn.
I don't wanna go to jail.
But I always help you, don't I?
IfoundaworkandI helped to Christopher to pay their studies.
I did my best to help him.
And I helped your brother with that will.
I helped you with your homework-- that was all.
A girl who moved into my building today.
He was never sure whether she was faithful to him or not... so I helped him out with this little setup.
Still, I do believe I've helped to raise the standard a little.
What's helping one more human going to matter more or less?
I helped out a bit here while you were busy with her.
